mean_cn: n. 批评，评论文章；  v. 批判，评论
mean_en: a careful judgment in which you give your opinion about the good and bad parts of something (such as a piece of writing or a work of art)
short_phrase: a critique of their other friend
sentence: Don't be upset when someone critiques your work.
sentence_trans: 当有人批评你的工作时，别沮丧。
